Translations.Text: Manuhe tomaka kiyamata samparke prasna karae. Koraa, ‘iyara prakrta jnana kerala allahara ocaratahe ache’. Kihe tomaka janaba? Sambharata kiyamata ati sighrae'i ha’ba parae
Niscaya allahe kaphirasakalaka abhisapta karaiche arau sihamtara babe prastuta raakhiche jbalanta ju'i
tata sihamta cirasthayi ha’ba arau sihamte kono abhibharaka napaba arau kono sahayakarai'o napaba
Yidina sihamtara mukhamandala ju'ita olata-palata karaa ha'ba, se'idina sihamte ka'ba, haya! Ami yadi allahaka manilohemtena arau raachulara anugatya karailohemtena
sihamte arau ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Ami amara netrbarga arau bisista lokasakalarahe anugatya karaichilo arau sihamtehe amaka pathabhrasta karaichila
‘he amara raba! Tumi sihamtaka dbiguna sasti diya arau sihamtaka maha abhisampata diya’

He imandarasakala! Muchaka yisakale kasta diche tomaloke sihamtara darae naha'ba, eteke sihamte yi ratana karaichila allahe te'omka tara paraa nirdosa pramanita karaichila; arau te'om achila allahara ocarata maryadabana
He imandarasakala! Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau sathika katha koraa

ene karaile te'om tomalokara babe tomalokara amalasamuha sansodhana karaiba arau tomalokara papasamuha ksama karaiba. Yi byakti allaha arau te'omra raachulara anugatya karae, si arasye maha saphalata arjana karaile

Niscaya ami akasasamuha, prthirai arau parbatamalara prati'o e'i amanatara prastara dichilo kintu sihamte e'ito (dayitbabhara) bahana karaibalai asbikara karaile arau seya la’balai bhaya karaile arau manuhe seya bahana karaile; niscaya si atyanta yalima, ati ajna

Yate allahe munaphika purausa arau munaphika narai lagate musbaraika purausa arau musbaraika naraika sasti diye arau mumina purausa arau mumina naraika ksama karae. Allaha atyanta ksamasila, parama dayalu
